results.corrected_us: As a Manny’s food service customer, I want food items to be displayed with different colors based on their type, so that I can quickly identify the food type visually.
results.optional_explanation: The original story includes specific color codes, which are implementation details. The core requirement is the visual differentiation by food type, not the exact colors.

results.corrected_us: As a reader, I want to bookmark pages, so that I can easily find relevant content later.
results.optional_explanation: The story clearly states the user role, goal, and value without conflating requirements or technical details.

results.corrected_us: As a Manny’s food service customer, I want to save my list, so that I can access it later for reordering or reference.
results.optional_explanation: The story is straightforward and well-defined, with a clear user goal and value.

results.corrected_us: As a blogger who codes, I want the blogging system to display my GitHub activity, so that my readers can see my coding contributions.
results.optional_explanation: The original story describes a technical integration with no direct user value; the corrected version emphasizes the benefit to readers.

results.corrected_us: As a Manny’s food service customer, I want to save, copy, print, and email my list, so that I can manage my orders and share them with others efficiently.
results.optional_explanation: The story combines multiple unrelated actions into one, making it too broad. It should be broken into smaller, focused stories.

results.corrected_us: As a tester, I want detailed test plans so that I can thoroughly verify the system once it is completed.
results.optional_explanation: The story is clear, with a specific role, goal, and value.

results.corrected_us: As a business user, I want a report of item profitability so that I can identify profitable items and address underperformers.
results.optional_explanation: The story is well-formed, with clear purpose and value.

results.corrected_us: As a system, I want to store customer account information and order lists in the database so that the system can manage user data effectively.
results.optional_explanation: The story is straightforward and specifies the system role and purpose clearly.

results.corrected_us: As a customer ordering food, I want to locate my previous order lists so that I can review past orders.
results.optional_explanation: The story is clear, with a specific user goal and value.

results.corrected_us: As a Manny’s food service customer, I want my custom item code to be easily visible, so that I can find it quickly on the screen.
results.optional_explanation: The original story specifies a technical detail (stand out) which is an implementation detail. The core is about visibility for quick identification.

results.corrected_us: As a blogger who codes, I want my GitHub activity displayed in my profile, so that readers can see my coding contributions and posts.
results.optional_explanation: The original story describes a technical feature without clear user value; the correction emphasizes the benefit to readers.

results.corrected_us: As a Manny’s food service customer, I want to save my list so that I can reorder from it later for more accurate and faster ordering.
results.optional_explanation: The story is clear, with a specific user goal and value.

results.corrected_us: As a customer ordering food, I want to see my saved order lists so that I can reuse them for future orders, making the process faster and more accurate.
results.optional_explanation: The story is well-defined, with clear purpose and benefit.

results.corrected_us: As a user, I want a dropdown with autocomplete and API-based search so that I can find products quickly.
results.optional_explanation: The story clearly states the user goal and the value of quick product search.

results.corrected_us: As a user, I want a new reporting system so that I can view all company data in one place.
results.optional_explanation: The story is broad but manageable; it should be broken down further, but as is, it is too broad for a single sprint.

results.corrected_us: As a developer, I want to finalize database table changes for the release so that we avoid making later modifications.
results.optional_explanation: The story is clear, with a specific technical goal.

results.corrected_us: As a business user, I want a report of item profitability so that I can identify profitable and underperforming items.
results.optional_explanation: This is a duplicate of US7, well-formed with clear purpose.

results.corrected_us: As a Google Keep user, I want my shopping lists in black and my daily notes in blue so that I can easily differentiate between them.
results.optional_explanation: The story is clear, with a specific user goal and benefit.

results.corrected_us: As a customer, I want to withdraw cash from an ATM so that I can avoid waiting in line at the bank.
results.optional_explanation: The story describes a technical capability but the core is the user benefit of avoiding bank queues.

results.corrected_us: As a project manager, I want to share projects with other users so that we can collaborate effectively.
